website_summaries.verdict: Supplying ample pocket space, this efficient sling comfortably holds your belongings as well as small to medium-sized animals.
pros: Excellent shoulder strap with supreme adjustability
Mesh window located at top of bag for ventilation
Built-in pockets and hooks throughout sling safely hold pet's accessories
cons: A little too big for pets under 6 pounds
Buyers wished the removable floor stayed in place

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality and style
customer_reviews.text: My puppy absolutely loves this bag! Added one of those little cooling pads to the bottom cuz my little one doesn't like to be hot. She gets in it on her own whenever she can. I love it because it has several pockets - enough to carry everything for puppy and me too! The quality is far beyond any other pet carrier I've seen. Very sturdy and stylish - has a bit of a nautical feel. The thick strap will make it comfortable to carry a 10 lb dog.
customer_reviews.author: sailgirl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pet carrier
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a carrier to fit my 17 lb Mal-Shi. This is perfect, it is deep, almost bucket like. I don't fear that he will fall or jump out. also, it is easy to put your fur baby into this, my dog is not a fan of carriers, so this is great, because he can see what is going on around him. The fabric is sturdy and the strap is comfortable and adjustable. I am tall so it works great that the strap is adjustable. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Blondieshopgirl

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but if your dog is 6 lbs ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, but if your dog is 6 lbs or under, the bag may be a little deep for them. Better for a dog 7-8 lbs or more so they can stick their head out. A bit too big for our tiny yorkie, but will still keep
customer_reviews.author: C Sanford

customer_reviews.title: Very practical and stylish sling!
customer_reviews.text: A simple, functional but stylish sling! Made with durable, thick material with a silky feel. Come with tons of pockets and especially love the side pocket slots for the wet tissue - very caring design!
customer_reviews.author: Philthesky

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo comfy for me AND my dog!!!
customer_reviews.text: The strap is so comfortable I can wear it all day and never get uncomfortable! It’s adjustable in height/length too! Dog just “hangs out” as you can see in photo. Leaves me free hands for shopping! Love this!!
customer_reviews.author: C.L.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pet carrier. My 5 pound Chichuahua hated every single pet carrier because they lacked support. This carrier bag has a hard bottom insert that gives her the support she needs to feel safe instead of feeling like she's in a hammock. She even falls asleep inside this bag while I'm walking because she feels so stable. It looks as if it's constructed incrediably well and it even has pockets for me to store my IPad, wallet, and phone for when we go on strolls.
customer_reviews.author: LadyJ

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for my 9 pound dog
customer_reviews.text: What to say I love this bag that more days I have it the better I like it. I did put a little blanket and at the bottom to cover the plastic piece that holds the bag sturdy. If you’re handy with a sewing machine putting a cover over that plastic piece would be a big help
customer_reviews.author: Bk

customer_reviews.title: a sling/purse that is hard to find
customer_reviews.text: I think this Hayden Pet Sling is amazing. It is more of a sling/purse. I wish there were more of these types on the market. Same style in different fabrics and colors. I would like to have the same sling/purse in a cotton blend type fabric, maybe a soft canvas. That would make it even better. The best part of this product is that the dog can actually sit on the inner plastic 'board.' Perhaps it could be a little sturdier/thicker. As it is, I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: SRH

customer_reviews.title: Great carrier, needs a padded handle
customer_reviews.text: Got this carrier so we could have our hands free to take pictures while sight-seeing. The carrier is sturdy and well-made and easily contained our 10-pound angry chihuahua. The handle needs more padding, however, as it's really uncomfortable. I'm going to add padding but it would be nice if the manufacturer did that
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Dover Loves It
customer_reviews.text: My 7 pound 12 year old dog goes every where with me. He already has a carrier but it does not have a flat bottom. This one has a flat bottom that makes it easier for him to get comfortable. Dover loves it. When he sees me pick it up he knows we're off to somewhere. I like that it has multiple pockets so I don't have to carry a purse. I wish that it came in muted colors but I put that aside for Dover's comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Gillette

customer_reviews.title: because it is a very nice bag and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This sling is very well made strong and a lot of pockets you can even carry a bottle of water for you and your pet. I have a 8lb long hair Chihuahua and he fits in well all the way around except height , it is to deep he has to hold his nose in the air to look out. It also hits him right across his trachea and chocks him. So i will be returning it only for that reason, because it is a very nice bag and worth the money. If they made the very same bag but lower it 3-4 in" it would be perfect for smaller dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: and best of all
customer_reviews.text: It's the small things that make this my choice of purchase; the padded adjustable shoulder strap, pockets for treats, toys and leash, and best of all, a removable hard bottom piece! It is hard to find a bag with a hard bottom that is not cumbersome and light. My dog is 8 lbs and fairly leggy but fits fine. only small complaint, the mesh top. I dont know what it is for and is constantly in the way when getting the dog in the bag. Nothing major but could definitely do without it. I would still buy it again though.
customer_reviews.author: GEG

customer_reviews.title: I love this!!
customer_reviews.text: This sling can be adjusted to my 5' frame or my husband's 6'2 frame. My Shih Tzu is 12 pounds and he fits in it comfortably. He doesn't have anxiety while in the sling because he sits as closely to me as if I am holding him. The sling is well made and the straps are wide and very comfortable. I love having my hands free without worrying if the sling will break. There are several pockets and they come in handy! I bought this product because I love taking my dog every where with me and so far we both love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Plumley

customer_reviews.title: made well
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, comfortable on my shoulder and also for my 10# dog
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Nagy

customer_reviews.title: My pooch gets excited when she sees this....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a Timbuk2 Mutt Mover backpack that was causing back issues. This sling is great. The thick shoulder strap is very comfortable and is easily adjustable. My 8 lb Pomeranian fits in it comfortably. The only downside is there is no padding in the pouch, so I added a small hand towel-but will eventually either make or buy a small pillow for the bottom. Otherwise this is a great product and with the price.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Best pet sling carrier I have found!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have tried several different sling carriers for our toy poodle and this is the best I have found. My dog loves riding in it and isn't all scrunched up. She can SIT in it as opposed to having her body curled. It has a hard bottom for support and is deeper than the others I tried. I also love all the pockets and clip rings on it. Very well made . I will probably cut out the mesh that is meant to go around the pet to hold it in. We don't need that and it is in the way.
customer_reviews.author: Gramma 204

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Ya’ll this bag is great and for the price I don’t think you can go wrong. Our dog hopped right in and was content with living her best life in this carrier. (See picture). She’s 19lbs and fit perfectly. I say it’s worth getting.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: It may be okay for some Pets & Owners
customer_reviews.text: My Chihuahua isn't a fan, and I wish they had other options rather than the bright colors. The shoulder strap isn't a really comfortable way to carry him. I ended up getting a "front pack" style which isn't as bulky and he prefers being in front of me rather than on my side.
customer_reviews.author: R. Finley

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and perfect for 11 lbs doggie!
customer_reviews.text: It's the best bag. Very comfortable for my 11 lbs Coton mix.
customer_reviews.author: Bristol Girl

customer_reviews.title: My Chihuahua climb into the bag she loves it
customer_reviews.text: I really love this bag I like that it has pockets so I can carry my dog's leash and a water bottle and anything I might need with with that it's very comfortable to wear my dog loves it the only thing I would change is the netting on it my dog's nails I do. Sometimes in it but other than that this bag is perfect my chihuahuas is about 7 lb I love to be carried around and so this bag makes me very happy
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Dailey

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME bag!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is PERFECT in every way. My Yorkie is about 7 lbs and he has plenty of room in it. He absolutely loves his bag. He sees me grab it and gets right in. I took the plastic bottom piece out because it wouldn’t stay in place but you don’t need it any way. Lots of pockets for keys wallet etc. The best part is no one thinks its a “dog bag” they think it’s just my purse then they realize there’s a dog in it. Lol. Its great quality and it’s a great accessory that I use every time we go out and about!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly C.

customer_reviews.title: My 16 yr old chi-rat terrier loves it and so do I!!!
customer_reviews.text: Has lots of pockets for doggy treats, leash, poop pick up bags and collapsable water bowl. Put a towel in mine, cause it was too deep for my little dog without using the mesh upper part, so I just keep the mesh folded in. I do like having that option available. Love the super wide adjustable padded strap My dog loves it! Camping she has her bed under the table, but half the time she prefers to sleep in/ on her pouch!😁👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's just perfect for my 7lb
customer_reviews.text: It's just perfect for my 7lb, 10 inch tall (head to toe) puppy. He won't fit in it for long, but I like all the pockets and it will just be his travel bag for stuff. The mannequin they use makes the bag look bigger than it really is a little bit. The mannequin has got to be only 5 foot tall at best.
customer_reviews.author: mmd83

customer_reviews.title: It’s the perfect pet carrier/diaper bag for dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a pet carrier exactly like this! First off, it’s very attractive and well made. It’s a cross body and the shoulder strap is comfortably. The bag it’self is sturdy and my dog fell asleep in it walking around the house. Plus pockets for keys, water, cell phone, poop bags and collapsed dog bowl. It’s the diaper bag for dogs! My 10 lb Lhasa Apsa has a heart condition and I end up carrying her up hills when we hike, and if I want to go at a faster pace. I haven’t tried it yet for that purpose but I can tell it’s right for us.
customer_reviews.author: KatBrandu

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy! COMFORTABLE!
customer_reviews.text: Met expectations and beyond! When I first opened it, it's as if she knew it was for her! I put her in it for about 15 mins around the house just to test it out. When I took her out, she yelled at me to put her back in the bag! ( I have a 10lb yorkie mix)💕🐶
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great pockets & size. Puppy is 5# right now so its a bit deep but we put a blanket in for him to sit on. Compartment size probably more perfect for 15- 20# dog. Strap is secure & once adjusted to hip area it is more stable
customer_reviews.author: nb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 10 pound dog
customer_reviews.text: I can carry my little dog after she’s done with her one mile and the big dog and I can finish the other miles 😁. She doesn’t have to sit home alone anymore yay !!!! Love all the extra pockets too!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Delight

customer_reviews.title: deep carrier good for long legged dogs - first one of multiple ...
customer_reviews.text: deep carrier good for long legged dogs - first one of multiple carriers purchased that is deep enough - good quality construction - fits nicely with wide straps over shoulder
customer_reviews.author: AER

customer_reviews.title: Functional and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Long strap and several pockets to bring everything my dog and I need while out for a day trip! Comfy for both us humans and our 8 pound pup. This is our favorite carrier!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pet carrier!
customer_reviews.text: This sling is wonderful. My little special needs dog fits inside perfectly and he loves feeling secure. He Is able to travel with me and I don’t have to try to carry him. I love all the pockets to stash treats, my phone and lots more. The sling is well made and durable. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable, carries well, pockets for bags, phones, leashes, treats, compact bow, cleans easy
customer_reviews.text: Love this carry all! My tea cup chi goes everywhere with me and my husband doesn't mind wearing the bag to carry our chi while we walk our Rottweilers or out shopping. Pockets are awesome and help keep all his goodies on hand with enough room for my necessities! Putting the pup in or pulling him out can be done 1 handed. He likes to sit in the bag in his car seat or in my lap. It took 2 trips out for him to get comfortible in it but now he gets excited when his bag and coat come out.
customer_reviews.author: JLHA

customer_reviews.title: I love it because the shoulder strap is wider and more ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an extremely well made quality item. I love it because the shoulder strap is wider and more comfortable plus it has a stable bottom so my Yorkie can stand which is preferable to the softer slings.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa M.

customer_reviews.title: Loved it but too small
customer_reviews.text: I loved this bag so much even though my dog was too big I was going to keep it as a purse, LOL. Very well made, lots of pockets for everything and looks stylish. I'd recommend it for a dog smaller than 10# and one that's used to being carried in bags as that also freaked out my little girl. Next time.
customer_reviews.author: AZRosie

customer_reviews.title: Stylish for puppy
customer_reviews.text: Great comfy bag but a little bulky. I’m sure it suits the pups. My little guy is 10 lbs. and he fits comfy n cozy. It maybe feels bulky cause I’m only 5’1”. Either way it’s a good value.
customer_reviews.author: kmFlorida

customer_reviews.title: Red, Blue and Beige
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I do like the product. My Sammy is about 11 lbs but he has a long body being a Chihuahua/Min Pin mix. It is well made, with a sturdy bottom and lots of pockets and no strings hanging from the stitching. The downsides: 1) The mesh is not removable and nails can get snagged. 2) the bottom has a removable plastic piece for the bottom but the cushion isn’t very thick.
customer_reviews.author: Rabbit902

customer_reviews.title: Alfie x B. Duck
customer_reviews.text: Well, I received the item today. Open the box the package was packaged well. The product is a little bigger than expected. my animal weights about 3 lls. I put her in after placing the strap over my shoulder, she looked comfortable and went to sleep and the bag is roomy. Great deal for the money the bag is well made and the design is awesome, I like the colors and I think its water resistance. I made a good choice. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a 10lb toy poodle!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a couple weeks now, and it is perfect for me and my 10 lb toy poodle. I've taken her on a "walk" every day with no complaints. Completely comfortable on my mile walks. I also love all the large pockets for my phone and the dog leash. I might put in a harder plastic bottom for the future, but it works great for now! (For reference, I have the bag on the shortest setting being 5'9", and when fully stretch out, it sits at my hip)
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Cashew chillin like a king
customer_reviews.text: cashew goes bananas when he sees the bag and cant wait to jump inside. i cut the mesh out entirely as it serves no purpose. both his arms need to hang out the bag chill'in style so he can see everything. he could be carried all day long if it were up to him. its super comfy too. I'm 5'9" and don't care what people think about me so if the colors are loud, my dog's happy. no strain on the neck either
customer_reviews.author: Jane Churchill

customer_reviews.title: Yay!
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful! I bought another similar bag for my little dogs that was much more stylish like a designer purse.. but both my dogs hated it, and the straps hurt me and were awkward. This bag may not be designer but both pups (separately) loved it and could easily fall asleep too. Neither one tried to get out like with the other bag. It has pockets on both sides very useful for bags toys and treats.
customer_reviews.author: Nini Sterling

customer_reviews.title: the perfect cling sling
customer_reviews.text: gave dog sling to a friend and she said it's a life saver and comfy for her little dog who prefers to cling with her everywhere. she goes....In this case, it's become the perfect cling sling :D
customer_reviews.author: DVD Addict

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend for your small dog
customer_reviews.text: We’ve tried many different methods to allow our 15 year old shih tzu mix to still go for walks with us even though she tired easily. Several different bags and backpacks. This is one of two, out of about 11 that worked for us. It’s easy to get her in and out of. She settles in nicely and it’s comfortable to carry her.
customer_reviews.author: T Rod

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My lil 7lb baby is happy as we take our stroll. She fits perfectly & comfortably in it & I like that there’s pockets & storage for my personal stuff ie cell phone; water bottle. Happy with my purchase & so is my lil’ pooch
customer_reviews.author: ingrid fung-cap

customer_reviews.title: VERY small dogs only!
customer_reviews.text: The product listing indicates that the carrier is for dogs "up to 12 pounds." The bag is too small for my terrier (just under 12 pounds). The bag is actually made for smaller dogs, maybe half or 2/3 that weight. Seems to be well-made and shoulder strap is padded -- but made for a smaller dog.
customer_reviews.author: Patisserie

customer_reviews.title: To warm to get much use out of in South Florida
customer_reviews.text: My 10 lb yorkie loves when I grab this bag. She knows she's going! It's a nice bag and made very sturdy, with a lot of pockets for everything. It is very warm bag for your little one, to warm to use most of the time in South Florida, but would make an awsome winter bag up north.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly0752

customer_reviews.title: my girl lasah apso bicheon mix 15lbs fits well. ...
customer_reviews.text: my girl lasah apso bicheon mix 15lbs fits well. will write more later.
customer_reviews.author: ladyhc

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable!! Our dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! I never thought I would be able to get our Chihuahua in another pet carrier again. We had a big party coming up and knew we needed to have something to keep her in. I knew if I kept her with me most of the day, she would be less likely to bark or be nervous. She did great! She fell asleep minutes later! I put her in the bag in a corner. No one even noticed she was in there. They thought it was someone's bag. She slept almost the whole party! Now, anytime she gets scared, she finds her bag and starts rooting around trying to get in. BRAVO, Petoga Couture!
customer_reviews.author: Troy L Klein

customer_reviews.title: So far my 10lb Sr. Toy Poodle likes it.  His old back limits his movement.  Wish the hard floor stayed down better.
customer_reviews.text: His old back just can run and play anymore. I’m really concerned about the way the bag ties at the neck. Collar anchor should be stronger. He has an easily collapsible larnex. Also the hard floor doesn’t stay in I am going try putting in large strips of vinyl. He’s ever so comfy and carrying him is wonderful too.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great bag! Well made but should be for small dogs only.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag. My 10lb chi just fits but I wouldn't want to carry her around for more than 30 mins. She gets heavy after a while! Well made bag much better than the outward hound bag that's similar.
customer_reviews.author: SNK

customer_reviews.title: My 5 lb yorkiepoo loved it
customer_reviews.text: I love this purchase.My pooch loves it and actually climbs in this bag to go to sleep when it is sitting next to me. Love all the pockets and size is perfect. I'm sure it will fit dogs much bigger than my 5 lb pup. Shoulder strap is very comfortable and adjustable. Very easy to slip on and off. Would buy again for sure
customer_reviews.author: JAK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: MY YORKIE IS 6 POUNDS AND FITS PERFECTLY IN THE CARRIER. SHE LOVES TO BE IN IT.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley

customer_reviews.title: adorable.. looks like a stylish bag so much ...
customer_reviews.text: adorable.. looks like a stylish bag so much so that people didn't notice my little guy in side all day while at a wine festival. we shopped and went into store with ease and felt he was totally safe, secure and comfy.. He's 7 lbs.. and long but he liked the snug feel.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Loved this bag!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. I have a 13lb Shih Tzu and this bag is perfect and exactly what I was looking for. This bag is not only really cute but it is well made and sturdy. I love all the side pockets which I use for keys and cell. I even carried my wallet and water with no problem. I had tried other bags but they weren’t deep enough but this one was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia medina

customer_reviews.title: Only Carrier My Yorkipoo Will Use!
customer_reviews.text: Love this carrier. Have a 13lb yoripoo that gets tired walking, while his brother likes to walk forever. This was the perfect solution. My only complaint, wish it came in all black or navy but that’s a personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: Sheda King

customer_reviews.title: Great carrier
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my 10 lb dogs. Lots of pockets to hold treats, leashes, doggie bags and even my coffee cup! Nice style and super comfortable, adjustable strap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bag for dogs 7” pounds or less
customer_reviews.text: He’s an agitated puppy but it worked well. He’s 12” pounds now and it’s gotten too little for him but I’ll keep for the next puppy or a smaller dog.
customer_reviews.author: M. Luca

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I like this bag, although it was smaller than I expected my 12lb dog still fits. It's light and comfy and i love all the pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Colon

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: My 9 pound chihuahua fits in this perfectly and seems to like it. It's very comfortable to carry him
customer_reviews.author: zglass

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t quite sure but I went ahead and ordered based on reviews and it is amazing quality! And everything the only thing is the saying on strap is different than in picture but it’s ok!
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Great carrier
customer_reviews.text: This is super nice and my baby Bochum loves it ❤️
customer_reviews.author: cathy Eide

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: While made well my 17 lb pup did not fit inside comfortably. Unless you have a tiny dog it will be a risky buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We tried.
customer_reviews.text: It was more of a purse than a bag for me and my dog. He hated it. He felt squished. I’m talking about a little tiny chihuahua. But the idea was nice. :)
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, sturdy, and comfortable for me and my dogs
customer_reviews.text: This bag is amazing in every way!!! It will hold up to at least 25 pounds, has all kinds of room, and is so comfy for the dog or cat! Well made! Great job guys!
customer_reviews.author: Scout

customer_reviews.title: Love it my dogs do too
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! My dogs do too I have two yourkis and they love coming with me everywhere!!
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: And I love all the pockets
customer_reviews.text: My dog enjoys being in this carry. And I love all the pockets.
customer_reviews.author: angela morgan

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: Love this to use with my 9 and 10 lb babies. It's very sturdy and easy to use. Please make a bigger size for me to use with my bigger dogs. Really a very nice product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it's built! Good, sturdy bag that will hold my puppy safely. Other "pooch slings" are flimsy and my pup wants to jump out.
customer_reviews.author: DebS

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST THING I EVER GOT, DOGGIES LOVE LOVE LOVE IT, PERFECT EVERYTHING THANKS
customer_reviews.text: THIS WAS THE BEST THING, I HAVE 3 DOGS BETWEEN 2 LBS AND 6 LBS AND THEY ALL LOVE IT SO MUCH, I CARRY THEM AROUND WHEN I DO LAUNDRY, DISHES, EVERYTHING EVEN IN THE CAR AND AT STORES, I HAVE MUSCULAR DYSTROPY AND THIS IS STILL FINE FOR ME TO LIFT AND CARRY, THANK YOU I WISH I HAD 2 OR 3 MORE...I MIGHT JUST HAVE TO GET A COUPLE MORE....THANKS SO MUCH
customer_reviews.author: kathleen cook

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it was not well accepted by my chihuahua. Nothing wrong with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Samsara

customer_reviews.title: For really small toy breed only
customer_reviews.text: This pet bag carrier is for really small dogs, toy breed, I have a chihuahua she is 11 pounds and was really uncomfortable, I ended up using to put all my dog stuff for when we go to road trips or long walks.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin

customer_reviews.title: Dog sling
customer_reviews.text: Love it it's not for summer my 3lb. Havanese gets warm inside. Better for cooler days. Good quality very strong and padded.
customer_reviews.author: Robbin Watson

customer_reviews.title: LOVED THIS
customer_reviews.text: This product is very well made, sturdy, and very nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this travel bag for our 12lbs dog! She is very comfy in it, too!!
customer_reviews.author: Patrizia Pelgrift

customer_reviews.title: That my dog is comfortable in it.
customer_reviews.text: My dog will disappears and I will find him in the bag. It is to big for him as he is only 3 lbs so I put a doggie bed pad folded in it.
customer_reviews.author: haskells5

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My Boston terrier is really happy about this carrier, the first time she tried it, she didn’t want to come down, she even fell asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Céline Koudoyor

customer_reviews.title: She takes a nice nap when we place her in it
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves this. Very roomy inside. She takes a nice nap when we place her in it!
customer_reviews.author: Freddy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS BY FAR THE BEST DOG CARRIER.I HAVE MANY..I LOVE THIS ONEAND SO DOES MY DOG..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product you will love my baby is about 10 pounds and it fits her perfect great transaction
customer_reviews.author: Linda Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Love it but smaller than I expected
customer_reviews.text: It is beautifully made but wish I would have ordered the larger size. I have a 12 pound Pomeranian and although he fits nicely with just him, adding anything to the pockets makes it too cramped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect dog carrier. We took our 4.5 lb min pun jet skiing and he loved every minute. Not too hot for him either.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Robles

customer_reviews.title: I’m impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sling! Very comfortable for me and my puppy. It’s incredibly well made and affordable. I definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Mejia

customer_reviews.title: Puppy favorite
customer_reviews.text: As described, comfortable to carry my 4.5 lb. maltipoo. Love all the pockets!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Tasior

customer_reviews.title: Cats don't like it at all!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter's cat. He would get in ir no matter what they triee. Also a little bit small.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bag my yorkie loves and feels secure quality is very good
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Well made, looks like the picture except big white writing on the blue shoulder strap, would rather not have the hughe writing takes away the attractivrness of the beautiful bag
customer_reviews.author: bluelyork

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this, when it’s rsinjng, snowing or just bad weather all together my Maltese fits right in here with out any issues or him being exposed to the harsh weather.
customer_reviews.author: Olga N. Kriska

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought This for my Mom and her new dog, she really likes it!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Finnerty Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy another
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and roomy. Love all the pockets, but wish there was one on the shoulder sling.
customer_reviews.author: Candice R.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable wearing and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves this bag! When I get it out and she sees it, she climbs right in it! And I love it because she is close to me!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S.

customer_reviews.title: Sassy approved
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, we will use it soon, I put my Sassy girl in it. a trial run. she likes it. Yeah :)
customer_reviews.author: Eve Broussard

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable and stylish pet carrier I have ever owned. I absolutely 😻 Love It!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! Surprisingly high quality for the price! Unfortunately it’s just a little too small for my 18 lb Pomeranian mix. Hey wish it came in a larger size!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B Smith

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS SO MUCH! So comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.text: SO COMFORTABLE FOR OWNER AND SO MUCH SPACE FOR DOG
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Moncure

customer_reviews.title: awesome carrier
customer_reviews.text: love this carrier!!! we got it for our 2lb puppy, and she loves it! she had to adjust to it at first, but then she was fine and stayed tucked away for hours!!
customer_reviews.author: JDSwelly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the pocket all around it! The bottom is hard enough where my very inquisitive dog and stand and look around. Love it! Bought it after buying TWO carriers that did not pass the test.
customer_reviews.author: BearBear

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit large for my 8 pound dog
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag!! It’s perfect for my 6 lb Papillon.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy watts

customer_reviews.title: Great for tiny dogs
customer_reviews.text: Way too small for my 10 pound guy. Well made but made for much smaller dogs. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Linda D. Bazzel

customer_reviews.title: I waste A LOT OF MONEY on my dog
customer_reviews.text: I waste A LOT OF MONEY on my dog, buying her bags, carriers and strollers that she hates and never use! At first I thought this is going to be another one of those bags that I order and never use and end up giving it away, but no! This bag turned out to be a life saver! Even my dog likes it and doesnt complain to go in it. Very glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love and so does my Maltese puppy he goes in ...
customer_reviews.text: love and so does my Maltese puppy he goes in it every where.. I might need a little bit bigger one. send me some info on one just a bit bigger.
customer_reviews.author: sandi byrnes

customer_reviews.title: I love this dog carrier and so does my chihuahua
customer_reviews.text: I love this dog carrier and so does my chihuahua. It is the perfect size and the adjustable strap makes it very comfortable to use. She begs to get into it when I put it on. My only wish would have been different color options, which I didn't see when I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey McAvoy Ross

product_meta.title: Alfie Pet - Hayden Pet Sling Carrier
feature_bullets: Measures 14"L x 6"D x 11"H, the shoulder strap can adjust up to 27" long
Claw-proof mesh windows on the top for superior ventilation also allows owners access to their pets without the risk of escape
Mesh side pocket with opening in the middle for easy access to wet tissue or litter bag
Extra hooks for those who need an extra hand
